summary: Comprehensive testing of e-Government Dashboard 'Agro Mopomulo' completed. Backend APIs 95% functional (21/22 tests passed), Frontend 98% functional with excellent integration between admin and public interfaces.

minor_bugs.issue: Update endpoint requires all fields (judul, konten, gambar_url) instead of allowing partial updates
minor_bugs.impact: Admin cannot partially update edukasi content
minor_bugs.error_details: 422 Unprocessable Entity - Field 'konten' required when only updating 'judul'

minor_interaction_issues.issue: Minor click interaction issue in dropdown selection
minor_interaction_issues.impact: Form still functional, dropdown works with alternative interaction

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and stats cards
Navigation menu works for all 8 pages (Beranda, Tentang, Kontribusi OPD, Peta Penanaman, Laporan, Galeri, Edukasi, Partisipasi)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor Edukasi update endpoint validation to allow partial updates (make konten and gambar_url optional in update model)
